channel.title: Home on jrgn
channel.description: Recent content in Home on jrgn

item.title: Cheater
item.description: Cheater is a simple program for printing and managing your own cheat sheets to print in terminal. For those like me, who always forget commands and stuff. Inspired by tldr and Cheaty. Written in Bash.

item.title: Plog
item.description: plog is a command line tool for creating project logs and entries from CLI. Keep track of projects (or anything) by having simple log files. Perfect for large school projects that require progress documentation. Written in Bash. This project is licensed with GNU General Public License v3 Tractor icons created by Futuer - Flaticon plog is made by me, JÃ¸rgen Skontorp
